column5: Garbage day today, found this while walking Ralphie.  Antique cow bell - cool  FullSizeRender (1) by Joeyfishing, on Flickr
..........is another man's (girl's) gold.  Great score! Pass that thing down.
What a bizarre thing to find on the curb! Cool
A cow girl probably lost it.

Hahaha, love these responses.   I love Christopher Walken!!!  Yes, what a bizarre thing to find is what I thought.  Then when I picked it up thinking, is this what I think it is, of course it was so loud dinging. I had to walk home holding the dinger part so people didn't look at me funny
I was gonna say... this report needs more cowbell.
I was gonna say... this report needs more cowbell.     That's hilarious!

Why? Anyone would have just thought you wished Ralphie was a cow is all... Or you didn't want to get busted for taking it eh...   Hahaha, ya, I know all my neighbours, didn't want them asking questions
You just got caught playing with your own ding a ling!
Should have just walked home shouting 'BRING OUT YOUR DEAD!'
That thing must have driven more than one cow crazy. Cool find

Great find for sure Joey  My dad grew up in Saskatchewan through the '30's and spent all summer, every summer, working on his uncles farm. They had a couple cows and they wore identical bells as yours.  Many many years later Dad went back to Saskatchewan to visit his now retired uncle and was given one of the bells as a gift.  That bell hung in Dad's den for years and after his death I asked Mom if I could have it but it had disappeared and nobody knew where it was.  I'd love to have it today to hang in my own den.

That bell hung in Dad's den for years and after his death I asked Mom if I could have it but it had disappeared and nobody knew where it was.  I'd love to have it today to hang in my own den.  I think Joey just found it!!!!
I think Joey just found it!!!!  Maybe we'll have to share it
Should have just walked home shouting 'BRING OUT YOUR DEAD!'  HAHAHA! Awesome!
Hahaha, Bring out your dead, that's hilarious.  Sorry to hear your cowbell disappeared Lew.  We can share for sure
Joey, a little time invested in a stick and you could be doing this:  Or perhaps this:  HH
Hey Joey, did any of your neighbours say that your face rings a bell when you walked past them?
Hey Joey, did any of your neighbours say that your face rings a bell when you walked past them?   Hahahaha, thank goodness no
Speaking of cowbells, why did cows wear bells back then but not now? More than a fashion statement I guess??
Great find !!
LOLâ€¦nice find Joey.  That "more Cowbell' thing is hilarious!
